本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the capital district,” the five-province region surrounding the royal capital, whether located at Fujiwara, Nara, Nagaoka, or Heian. It included the provinces of Yamato, Yamashiro, Kawachi, Izumi, and Settsu.
